=== Loco Teams ===

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-it-promozione|Ubuntu Italian Marketing Team]]</nowiki>
** Ubuntu CD project:
     This project is for users who have no fast internet connection and want a Ubuntu CD. They can request it through ship-it but it takes about one month.
     The Ubuntu Italian CD project team will send the CDs to users in just a few days. Users send us a blank CD, we burn it and send it back with a sticker.

** Ubuntu stickers project
     We distribute Ubuntu stickers provided by System76 to all users who request them.
